languages.text: "Неужели? Потому-то твои слуги устроили {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusViolent}сечу среди себе подобных{/d}? Потому-то ваши орудия принялись калечить Лилэтан с орбиты? Твои слова полны лжи и лицемерия, мон-кай".

traits.locale_text: "Неужели? Потому-то твои слуги устроили сечу среди себе подобных? Потому-то ваши орудия принялись калечить Лилэтан с орбиты? Твои слова полны лжи и лицемерия, мон-кай".

languages.text: "Is that so? Is that why your servants have been {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusViolent}slaughtering their own kind{/d}? Is that why your weapons sought to disfigure the Lilaethan from orbit? Your words are nothing but lies and hypocrisy, mon-keigh."
languages.original_text: "Неужели? Потому-то твои слуги устроили {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusViolent}сечу среди себе подобных{/d}? Потому-то ваши орудия принялись калечить Лилэтан с орбиты? Твои слова полны лжи и лицемерия, мон-кай".

traits.locale_text: "Is that so? Is that why your servants have been slaughtering their own kind? Is that why your weapons sought to disfigure the Lilaethan from orbit? Your words are nothing but lies and hypocrisy, mon-keigh."

"Is that so? Is that why your servants have been slaughtering their own kind? Is that why your weapons sought to disfigure the Lilaethan from orbit? Your words are nothing but lies and hypocrisy, mon-keigh."

"Is that so? Is that why your servants have been slaughtering their own kind? Is that why your weapons sought to disfigure the Lilaethan from orbit? Your words are nothing but lies and hypocrisy, mon-keigh."

"Is that so? Is that why your servants have been slaughtering their own kind? Is that why your weapons sought to disfigure the Lilaethan from orbit? Your words are nothing but lies and hypocrisy, mon-keigh."

languages.text: “真的是这样吗？这就是为什么你的仆人{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusViolent}一直在屠杀同类{/d}吗？这就是为什么你的武器打算从轨道上摧毁莉莱赞吗？你的话里充满了谎言和虚伪，猴子。”
languages.original_text: "Is that so? Is that why your servants have been {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusViolent}slaughtering their own kind{/d}? Is that why your weapons sought to disfigure the Lilaethan from orbit? Your words are nothing but lies and hypocrisy, mon-keigh."

traits.locale_text: “真的是这样吗？这就是为什么你的仆人一直在屠杀同类吗？这就是为什么你的武器打算从轨道上摧毁莉莱赞吗？你的话里充满了谎言和虚伪，猴子。”

languages.text: 「それがどうした？それがお前の従者が{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusViolent}同族の人間を殺し続ける{/d}理由か？お前の兵器が衛星軌道からリラエタンを攻撃しようとした理由か？お前の言葉は嘘と偽善以外の何物でもないぞ、モン＝ケイ」
languages.original_text: "Is that so? Is that why your servants have been {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusViolent}slaughtering their own kind{/d}? Is that why your weapons sought to disfigure the Lilaethan from orbit? Your words are nothing but lies and hypocrisy, mon-keigh."

traits.locale_text: 「それがどうした？それがお前の従者が{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusViolent}同族の人間を殺し続ける{/d}理由か？お前の兵器が衛星軌道からリラエタンを攻撃しようとした理由か？お前の言葉は嘘と偽善以外の何物でもないぞ、モン＝ケイ」

languages.text: "Tatsächlich? Haben Eure Diener deshalb {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusViolent}ihresgleichen getötet{/d}? Sollten Eure Waffen deshalb Lileath aus dem Orbit entstellen? Eure Worte sind nichts als Lügen und Heuchelei, Chem-Pan-Sey."
languages.original_text: "Is that so? Is that why your servants have been {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusViolent}slaughtering their own kind{/d}? Is that why your weapons sought to disfigure the Lilaethan from orbit? Your words are nothing but lies and hypocrisy, mon-keigh."

traits.locale_text: "Tatsächlich? Haben Eure Diener deshalb ihresgleichen getötet? Sollten Eure Waffen deshalb Lileath aus dem Orbit entstellen? Eure Worte sind nichts als Lügen und Heuchelei, Chem-Pan-Sey."

languages.text: « Ah oui ? Est-ce pour cette raison que vos serviteurs {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusViolent}massacrent leurs semblables{/d} ? Que vos armes en orbite ont tenté de défigurer la lilaethan ? Tout ce qui sort de votre bouche n'est que mensonge et hypocrisie, mon-keigh. »
languages.original_text: "Is that so? Is that why your servants have been {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusViolent}slaughtering their own kind{/d}? Is that why your weapons sought to disfigure the Lilaethan from orbit? Your words are nothing but lies and hypocrisy, mon-keigh."

traits.locale_text: « Ah oui ? Est-ce pour cette raison que vos serviteurs massacrent leurs semblables ? Que vos armes en orbite ont tenté de défigurer la lilaethan ? Tout ce qui sort de votre bouche n'est que mensonge et hypocrisie, mon-keigh. »

languages.text: «¿Es eso cierto? ¿Es por ese motivo que vuestros sirvientes han estado {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusViolent}masacrando a los suyos{/d}? ¿Por eso vuestras armas pretendían desfigurar el Lilaethan desde la órbita? Tus palabras no son más que mentiras e hipocresía, mon-keigh».
languages.original_text: "Is that so? Is that why your servants have been {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusViolent}slaughtering their own kind{/d}? Is that why your weapons sought to disfigure the Lilaethan from orbit? Your words are nothing but lies and hypocrisy, mon-keigh."

traits.locale_text: «¿Es eso cierto? ¿Es por ese motivo que vuestros sirvientes han estado masacrando a los suyos? ¿Por eso vuestras armas pretendían desfigurar el Lilaethan desde la órbita? Tus palabras no son más que mentiras e hipocresía, mon-keigh».

languages.text: "Öyle mi? Bu yüzden mi hizmetkârların, {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusViolent}kendi türünden olanı{/d} katlediyor? Bu yüzden mi yörüngeden silahlarınla Lilaethan'ın güzelliğini bozmaya çalıştın? Sözlerin yalandan ve ikiyüzlülükten ibaret mon-keigh."
languages.original_text: "Is that so? Is that why your servants have been {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusViolent}slaughtering their own kind{/d}? Is that why your weapons sought to disfigure the Lilaethan from orbit? Your words are nothing but lies and hypocrisy, mon-keigh."

traits.locale_text: "Öyle mi? Bu yüzden mi hizmetkârların, türdeşlerini katlediyor? Bu yüzden mi yörüngeden silahlarınla Lilaethan'ın güzelliğini bozmaya çalıştın? Sözlerin yalandan ve ikiyüzlülükten ibaret mon-keigh."
